title: The Princess I Hate to Love
description: Our marriage is not some fairy tale.And my new wife?She’s not exactly a fan of the crown jewels.I’m a prince and heir to the throne of Salasia. I’m the most eligible bachelor in Europe.You’d think any woman would be ecstatic to marry me.Except for the one woman who I must marry to save my throne. She’d rather give me a poison apple than true love’s kiss.Now the pair of us must convince the world that our marriage isn’t just a convenient arrangement. As for me? I’ll prove to this stubborn princess that happily ever after isn’t just for fairy tales.The Princess I Hate to Love is the conclusion to The Heir Affair Duet, beginning with book one, The Prince I Love to Hate.
author: Iris Morland
